definitions.definition: ( medicine ) A tapered cylindrical instrument for introducing an object into a tubular anatomical structure , or to dilate such a structure, as with an esophageal bougie.

main_definition: ( medicine ) A tapered cylindrical instrument for introducing an object into a tubular anatomical structure , or to dilate such a structure, as with an esophageal bougie.

definitions.definition: ( chiefly African-American Vernacular , slang , usually derogatory ) A person who exhibits bougie behavior.

main_definition: ( chiefly African-American Vernacular , slang , usually derogatory ) A person who exhibits bougie behavior.

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of bowjy ( “ shed for cattle or sheep ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of bowjy ( “ shed for cattle or sheep ” ) .
